section_name: Classification of Radiolarian Fossil Zones and Environmental Analysis of Gufeng Formation in Lower Yangtze Region (Page 1)
location_of_the_samples_and_sections: 2 km southwest of Xiaodong, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China (Page 2)
associated_fossils: Al-baillellaria, spherical radiolaria, Latentifistularia, Entactinaria, hexactinellids, demosponges (Page 1)
